jathika saukhya sathiya mahanuwara maha rohale di ada (3 da) saukhya amathiwarayage pradhanathwayen aarambha kere.mahajana sewaka sabandatha dawasa lesa nam kara athi ada dawasa thula di samastha saukhya sewa aayathanawalata adala deshapalana adhikariya, rohal sanwardhana kamitu, sewaka upadeshaka sabha athulu kandayam raswa kandayam sabandathawa diyunu kara ganimath, ee ee rohalwala thibena adupadu ha dushkaratha handunaganimath, awashya daththa ha thorathuru raskirimath, ee pilibanda wartha sakas kirimath sidukere.jathika saukhya sathiyata samagamiwa kriyathmaka karana jathika maduru mardana sathiya thula sama pradeshayakama niwasa, gewathu ha wenath parishra pariksha kirima sandaha saukhya baladharin samanga polis niladharin athulu aarakshaka anshawala niladharin niwes wetha paminima da sidukere..
